CODIF_DATA.TY_TYPE_BID: Submission for one or more lots

ML_TI_DOC.TI_CY: Dik li kienet ir-Repubblika Jugoslava tal-Maċedonja

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Faculty of Medicine Skopje

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Faculty of Medicine Skopje
Electronic System for Public Procurement (ESJN: https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk/)

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Chemicals and reagents compatible to the device for hybridization BeeBlot or equivalent.

LOCATION.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine, Skopje, 50 Divizija No 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Chemicals and reagents compatible to the device for hybridization BeeBlot or equivalent.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Enzyme Taq DNA Polymerase max 250 units and concentration of 5 units/µl, Taq DNA Polymerase which includes the following reagents: Taq DNA Polymerase 250 units, PCR Buffer 10 times concentrated for amplification of of specific PCR products containing KCl and (NH4) 2SO4, PCR Buffer 10 times concentrated which contains 2 marker colors (orange and red) and serves to visualize the PCR products of agarose gel, a denaturation buffer of DNA sequences that are rich in GC nucleotides or have a complex secondary structure, and MgCl2, 25 mM.

Set of reagents for the detection of haemochromatosis. The offered set of reagents to include at least the following reagents: marked strips for mutation detection, lysis solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

Set of reagents for the detection of cytochrome genetic mutations (CYP), CYP2D6 set. The offered set of reagents to include at least the following reagents: marked strips for mutation detection, lysis solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

Set of reagents for the detection of cytochrome genetic mutations (CYP), CYP2C19. The offered set of reagents to include at least the following reagents: marked strips for mutation detection, lysis solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

Set of reagents for detection of intolerance to lactose and fructose. The offered set of reagents to include at least the following reagents: marked strips for the detection of at least 6 mutations (Aldo B delE4, Aldo B A174D, Aldo B A149P, Aldo B N334K, LCT -13910 T> C, LCT -22018 A> G), Solution for lysis, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution-B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

Set of reagents for detection of at least 8 mutations (eNOS -786 TC, eNOS G894T, LTA C804A, ACE I / D, GPIIIa L33P (HPA-1), β-Fibrinogen -455 GA, Apo B R3500Q, Apo E2 / E3 / E4 ) triggers of cardiovascular diseases. The offered set of reagents to include at least the following reagents: marked strips for mutation detection, lysis solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

Set of reagents for detection of at least 9 mutations (FV G1691A (Leiden), FV H1299R (R2), Prothrombin G20210A, MTHFR C677T, MTHFR A1298C, Factor XIII V34L, PAI-1 4G / 5G, EPCR A4600G, EPCR G4678C) triggers of cardiovascular diseases. The offered set of reagents to include at least the following reagents; marked strips for mutation detection, lysing solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Contract Performance Guarantee: Bank Guarantee of 10 %.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: Statement by the economic operator that it has not been sentenced, in the last 5 years, with effective court decision for participation in criminal organisation, corruption, fraud or money laundering.
Certificate that it is not subject to bankruptcy procedure issued by competent authority.
Certificate that it is not subject to liquidation procedure issued by competent authority.
Certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public dues by the competent authority in the country where that economic operator is established.

Certificate from the Legal Entities Penal Registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — prohibition to participate in public competitions, public procurement contract award and public-private partnership contract award procedures.
Certificate from the Legal Entities Penal Registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — temporary or permanent prohibition to perform certain professional activity.

Certificate that it is not being sanctioned for misdemeanor with an effective court decision, resulting in prohibition for pursuing professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing certain business activity.
Ability of the economic operator to perform business activity:
Certificate for wholesale of medical devices in accordance with the Law on medicines and medical devices.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: Certificate for placing the medical device on the market or temporary or permanent approval for parallel import in accordance with the Law on medicines and medical devices for items 8809 (Lot 2), 8810 (Lot 4), 8811 (Lot 3), 7058 (Lot 7), 7059 (Lot 6) and 7959 (Lot 5).

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: The economic operator for the offered goods to provide an authorization for placing the medical device on the market or temporary or permanent approval for parallel import, in accordance with the Law on medicines and medical devices, for items 8809 (Lot 2), 8810 (Lot 4), 8811 (Lot 3), 7058 (Lot 7), 7059 (Lot 6) and 7959 (Lot 5).

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: To participate on electronic auction economic operators need to register on ESPP (Electronic System for Public Procurement) website: www.e-nabavki.gov.mk
Tender documentation, technical specification, forms and information for Open Procedure No 18/2017 are provided on the same website.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Electronically, ESJN (https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk/); Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine — Skopje, 50 Divizija No 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: State Appeals Commission for Public Procurement
